Mary Poppins , the nanny who comes flying in takes you on an unforgettably enchanting journey .
Based on the children 's book by P.L. Travers , Mary Poppins is about the adventures of a magical nanny and how she helps reunite a family .

George Banks , a banker , and his wife , Winifred are too busy and distracted to spend time with their children , Jane and Michael .
